official_title: A bill to provide for the return to the former owners of certain former tribal lands acquired in connection with the Garrison Dam and Reservoir.

summary.text: Provides for the return to the former owners of former tribal lands acquired in connection with the Garrison Dam and Reservoir project, North Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the return to the former owners of certain former tribal lands acquired in connection with the Garrison Dam and Reservoir.
